blogList.name: ...my weaknesses as a developer
blogList.description: I wanted to document my current situation on what I believe to be my weaknesses as a developer so far. I think it will be a great read in a few years to see how many of these exist still, and what new ones have arised.

blogList.name: ..time management and a bootcamp
blogList.description: How I personally deal with stress and anxiety from the pressure of having 1 million things to do on my mind.

blogList.name: ...my first coherent app
blogList.description: The mini revelation, when writing code, I had in the first few weeks at Coder Academy. It had been a while since I had thought this way so it was great to have my memory jogged about this.

blogList.name: ... a few things I learnt from a ruby terminal app
blogList.description: A few points on things I picked up from my first code sprint that was for our first piece of assessment at Coder Academy. First time writing docs too.

blogList.name: ...a few things I learnt building a portfolio site
blogList.description: A few more pointers I picked up from my experience with building an end product in only CSS/SASS and HTML. When I wrote this description though, my dislike of CSS (even though I love design) has lessened due to CSS frameworks.

blogList.name: ...a *rough* guide on building a CSS avatar
blogList.description: I came across a cool avatar and really wanted to recreate it for my profile picture with only CSS (told you I like design). This is a quick guide on how to build one yourself.
